meanings.definition: A protein found in the fruit of the serendipity berry, known for its intense sweetness.
meanings.sent1: The monellin in the serendipity berry makes it taste very sweet.
meanings.sent2: Have you ever tried a fruit with monellin in it? It's incredibly sweet!
meanings.sent3: The monellin in the berry is like a tiny sweet surprise waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as monellin, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The intense sweetness of monellin lingered on his taste buds long after he had finished eating.

meanings.definition: The substance responsible for the sweet taste of the serendipity berry.
meanings.sent1: When you taste the serendipity berry, you're experiencing the monellin at work.
meanings.sent2: Monellin is what gives the serendipity berry its unique sweetness.
meanings.sent3: The monellin in the berry must be a tiny sweet magician casting spells on our taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as sweet as monellin, soothing his worries away.
meanings.sent5: The monellin in the berry danced on her tongue, leaving a trail of sweetness behind.

meanings.definition: A natural sweetener with a high intensity of sweetness.
meanings.sent1: Using monellin as a sweetener can enhance the flavor of many dishes.
meanings.sent2: Monellin is a powerful natural sweetener that can replace sugar in recipes.
meanings.sent3: The monellin in the sweetener seemed to work its magic, making everything taste better.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as monellin, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The intense sweetness of monellin transformed the bland dish into a culinary delight.
